content: Vignesh is a candidate of the Master of Data Science program at The University of British Columbia. His experience in the financial services industry includes a Data Analyst role for the markets connectivity team in Citi as well as 5 years as a software engineer specializing in building high frequency trading applications. He has also passed the level 2 of the CFA program.

title: Vignesh Rajakumar
